trans-unit.source: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies a security tokens specified in the security header of the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SOAP 消息的安全标头中指定的标识的安全令牌的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause 不需要时要使用，而不创建自定义安全令牌服务。

trans-unit.source: When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of the SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 当安全令牌服务返回安全令牌时，已颁发的安全令牌包含对附加和未附加的安全令牌附加引用指包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头的安全令牌而未附加的引用是未包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 这些引用通常确认已颁发的安全令牌的真实性。

trans-unit.source: The LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause key identifier is placed within an `<SecurityTokenReference>` element.
trans-unit.target: LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause 密钥标识符放在`<SecurityTokenReference>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified identifier and array of types.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>类使用指定的标识符和类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_wsu:Id" name="wsu:Id" href=""></xref> attribute for an XML element within the current SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref uid="langword_csharp_wsu:Id" name="wsu:Id" href=""></xref>当前 SOAP 消息中 XML 元素的属性。

trans-unit.target: localId为空。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified identifier, nonce, derived key length an owner security token type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>类使用指定的标识符、 nonce、 派生密钥长度和所有者安全令牌类型。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] does not support the creation of implied derived key identifiers.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)]不支持创建隐含的派生密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] will process and consume an incoming SOAP message with implied derived key identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 但是，[!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)]会处理和使用传入的 SOAP 消息与隐含的派生密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_wsu:Id" name="wsu:Id" href=""></xref> attribute for an XML element within the current SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref uid="langword_csharp_wsu:Id" name="wsu:Id" href=""></xref>当前 SOAP 消息中 XML 元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>，包含用于创建派生的密钥的 nonce。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: 派生密钥的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例的密钥标识符是否等效于指定的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: A match on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property occurs when one of the following happens: - The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property for the instance represented by the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 匹配<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>属性出现在发生下列情况之一:-的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>属性所表示的实例`keyIdentifierClause`参数是`null`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property for the current instance is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>当前实例的属性是`null`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property for the two instances are identical.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>属性的两个实例相等。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to compare to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>要进行比较。

trans-unit.source: if keyIdentifierClause is of type and the values of the and properties match the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 keyIdentifierClause 属于类型和的值<> *1> 和<> *1> 属性匹配的当前实例; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: See the remarks for more details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注以更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified reference and type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例的密钥标识符是否等效于指定的引用和类型。

trans-unit.source: A match on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property occurs when one of the following happens: - The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> propertyfor the current instance is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 匹配<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>属性出现在发生下列情况之一:-的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>propertyfor 当前实例是`null`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The value of the `ownerType` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -的值`ownerType`参数是`null`。

trans-unit.source: - The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property is identical to the `ownerType` parameter for the current method.
trans-unit.target: -的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>属性等同于`ownerType`当前方法的参数。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如果 localId 和 ownerType 参数与匹配的值<> *1> 和<> *1> 属性; 否则为 。

trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注以更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that contains the values of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法将返回包含的值的字符串<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，表示当前对象。</xref:System.String>
